Test Name: T-Cell Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia/Lymphoma (ALL) Enrollment Testing, FISH
Specimen Type: Bone marrow aspirate or peripheral blood
Purpose: To detect chromosomal abnormalities associated with T-cell ALL/lymphoma for Children's Oncology Group enrollment using fluorescent in situ hybridization.
Container: Lithium heparin or sodium heparin tube
Equipment: Fluorescent microscope, hybridization chamber, incubator, microscope slides, pipettes
